description: Stay comfortable and stylish with our all-new Dry-Fit T-shirt during your workouts and everyday activities. Crafted from high-quality moisture-wicking fabric, it is designed to keep you cool and dry even during the most intense activities. Whether you are hitting the gym, going for a run, or lifting heavy weights, this t-shirt will be a perfect fit for all active individuals.
name: Dry-Fit Men's T-shirt

description:
Elevate your muscle building journey with our dynamic Muscle Max combo of IsoMagic & Creatine. Designed for fitness enthusiasts who are committed to building muscles, enhancing strength and maximize recovery.

IsoMagic delivers approx. 27 g protein/33 g serving with minimal fats and low carbs. Enhanced with added recovery formula it stands as a result-driven choice for lean muscle growth and recovery.

Complementing IsoMagic, our Creatine offers 100% pure & micronized creatine monohydrate formula. Each 3g scoop fuels muscles during intense workout enhancing strength and power.

Creatine becomes more effective when paired with IsoMagic post-workout, as exercise-induced muscle fatigue boosts creatine uptake. IsoMagic helps replenish amino acids, accelerating muscle repair, while insulin response from protein enhances creatine absorption. This Muscle Max Combo maximizes muscle recovery, strength, and growth, making it an ideal post-workout combination.
name: Muscle Max Combo - IsoMagic(Pineapple 1 Kg) + Creatine Monohydrate

description:
Unleash your full workout potential with our Ultimate Power Combo of IsoMagic and PowerHouse. This combo brings together essential muscle-building protein and energy enhancing nutrients giving you the edge to conquer every workout session.

IsoMagic delivers approx. 27 g protein/33 g serving with minimal fats and low carbs. Enhanced with added recovery formula it stands as a result-driven choice for lean muscle growth and recovery.

PowerHouse (15 g per serving) is a non-jittery formula, packed with muscle saver ingredients like BCAA, L-glutamine, etc. to maximize energy, stamina and performance. PowerHouse goes beyond mere energy boost, providing you with sustained energy from the first rep till the last.
name: Ultimate Power Combo - IsoMagic(Pineapple) + PowerHouse

description:
Unlock the power of complete wellness with Vitammune, a premium blend of essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants designed to support your active lifestyle. Whether you’re looking to boost immunity, enhance energy, or maintain overall health, Vitammune has you covered.

Crafted to meet the demands of modern-day lifestyle, this formula provides a wide range of nutrients, including vitamin C, Zinc, Vitamin D3, and B complex vitamins, etc. to support your immune system, promote energy production, and combat stress and fatigue.
Enriched with antioxidants and natural extracts like Ashwagandha, Vitammune doesn’t just protect your body—it revitalizes your mind, improving focus and reducing stress. Whether you're an athlete, a busy professional, or simply someone who values optimal health, this multivitamin is your go-to solution for all-around wellness.
name: Vitammune, Multivitamins & minerals Capsule

description:
Boost your strength, performance, and muscle mass with 2X Nutrition’s Creatine. Each scoop (3g) contains premium creatine formula which is 100% pure, micronized creatine monohydrate, the most researched form. This unflavored powder mixes easily into your favorite pre-workout, shakes or smoothies without altering the taste, making it perfect for anyone looking to enhance their workout performance without unnecessary additives.

Creatine monohydrate helps fuel your muscles during intense workouts, promoting increased strength, power, endurance, and lean muscle mass. Whether lifting weights or engaging in endurance training, 2X Nutrition Creatine Monohydrate supports you to push past your limits.
name: Creatine, 100% Pure & Micronized

description:
ISOMAGIC

Elevate Your Fitness Goals with IsoMagic - The Ultimate Whey Protein Isolate

Unleash your full potential with IsoMagic, a premium-quality whey protein isolate blend by 2X Nutrition, designed specifically for fitness enthusiasts seeking optimal results.

Why Choose IsoMagic?

	*

High Protein Content: Each 33g serving delivers a whopping 27g of protein, ensuring your muscles get the nourishment they need to grow and recover.
	*

Low in Fat and Carbs: With only 0.7g of fat and 3g of carbs per serving, IsoMagic is perfect for those aiming to maintain a lean physique.
	*

Added Recovery Formula: Infused with L-Glutamine and BCAAs, IsoMagic enhances muscle recovery, reduces soreness, and boosts overall workout performance.

Available Flavours:

Indulge your taste buds with two irresistible options:

	*

Belgian Chocolate: For a rich, creamy treat.
	*

Pineapple: A refreshing twist to your daily protein intake.

Packaging Options:

Choose the size that suits your fitness journey:

	*

1kg ( updated)
	*

2kg

Why IsoMagic Stands Out:

Whether you're looking for the best whey protein powder in India, a high-quality whey protein isolate, or a versatile option in 1kg and 2kg packs, IsoMagic is your go-to choice. The scientifically crafted formula not only supports muscle building but also aids in faster recovery and enhanced performance during intense workout sessions.
name: IsoMagic, Premium Whey Isolate Blend (Belgian Chocolate-1kg)

description:
Our premium Whey-Based High-Protein Mass Gainer, RealGainz is expertly formulated to fuel your muscle mass-gaining goals. Unlike many mass gainers, it is free from maltodextrin, ensuring a cleaner and healthier bulk.

Packed with a perfect 1:3 ratio of protein (26g) to carbohydrates (78g) per serving, it leverages high-quality whey protein and cereal-based complex carbs to provide sustained energy and muscle repair.

It is infused with a comprehensive multivitamin blend and added probiotics to boost overall wellness and digestion. These enhance nutrient absorption and gut health, ensuring you get the most out of every scoop.

A unique inclusion of digestive enzymes further aids in breaking down nutrients, making RealGainz easy on your stomach and efficient in delivering essential nutrients to your muscles.

It is ideal for those committed to serious muscle mass growth and overall health.
name: RealGainz, No Maltodextrin Mass Gainer (Kulfi- 2kg)

description: Elevate your fitness routine with our premium Mini Grenade Shaker. Designed to seamlessly integrate into your active lifestyle and to keep you hydrated throughout the day. This shaker is your perfect companion if you’re looking for optimal nutrition along with convenience. Crafted with high-quality materials, its sleek and leak-proof design ensures mess-free mixing, allowing you to prepare your protein shakes, smoothies, and supplements with ease.
name: Mini Grenade Shaker

description:
Power up your performance and accelerate your muscle growth with our Ultimate Gain & Sustain Combo, featuring RealGainz and Powerhouse.

RealGainz is a premium and zero maltodextrin whey-based high-protein mass gainer, designed to fuel your muscle-building journey without compromising on quality. With 1:3 protein-to-carbohydrate ratio (26g protein and 78g carbs per serving), RealGainz provides sustained energy and enhanced lean muscle growth. Enriched with multivitamin blend, probiotics, and digestive enzymes, it supports overall wellness, digestion, and nutrient absorption.

Paired with 2X's PowerHouse, this duo delivers the stamina, energy, and focus you need to push harder in every session. PowerHouse’s potent blend of L-Arginine, Beta-Alanine, L-Glutamine, and BCAAs powers you up for peak performance, helping you sustain energy from start to finish.
name: Gain & Sustain Combo - RealGainz(Kulfi) + PowerHouse

description:
Say goodbye to stubborn fat with our Natural Thermogenic Fat Burner, MetaBoost. Each capsule is designed as a powerful yet gentle formula to help you achieve your fat loss goals without compromising your well-being.
Made with 100% natural ingredients, MetaBoost is crafted to boost your metabolism and energy levels while shedding unwanted fat. Unlike other fat burners, MetaBoost is free from any side effects like heart palpitations or dizziness.

You’ll feel confident and in control, as it works to ignite your body’s natural fat-burning processes, helping you tackle even the most stubborn areas of fat.

Experience a noticeable boost in stamina and energy, keeping you active and focused throughout the day. Whether you’re powering through workouts or managing a busy lifestyle, MetaBoost will keep you performing
name: MetaBoost, Natural & Thermogenic Fat Loss Supplement

description:
Fuel your workout sessions with our PowerHouse, a high-performance pre-workout, designed to power through intense workouts with enhanced energy and focus. Perfectly dosed with 200mg of Caffeine, it provides a clean energy boost without the jitters/itching or redness so you can train harder and longer with confidence.

Packed with BCAA and L-Glutamine, PowerHouse energizes and protects your muscles, supporting faster recovery and reducing muscle breakdown during even the toughest sessions.

PowerHouse also enhances your focus, keeping you locked in and ready to tackle every rep, every set, and every challenge. Whether lifting, running, or pushing your limits in any sport, this pre-workout is your ultimate workout companion.
name: PowerHouse, High-performance Pre-workout
